00025 void usage(const char *s) {
00026         cerr << "usage:\n" << s
00027                         << "[<cam number>|<video file>]  [-m <model image>] [-r]\n"
00028                         "       -m      specifies model image\n"
00029                         "       -r      do not load cached model image\n";
00030         exit(1);
00031 }
00032 
00033 int main( int argc, char** argv )
00034 {
00035         CvCapture* capture = 0;
00036 
00037         const char *captureSrc = "0";
00038         bool relearn=false;
00039 
00040         // parse command line
00041         for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00042                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-m") ==0) {
00043                         if (i==argc-1) usage(argv[0]);
00044                         modelFile = argv[i+1];
00045                         i++;
00046                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-r")==0) {
00047                         relearn=true;
00048                 } else if (argv[i][0]=='-') {
00049                         usage(argv[0]);
00050                 } else {
00051                         captureSrc = argv[i];
00052                 }
00053         }
00054 
00055         if(strlen(captureSrc) == 1 && isdigit(captureSrc[0]))
00056                 capture = cvCaptureFromCAM( captureSrc[0]-'0');
00057         else 
00058                 capture = cvCaptureFromAVI( captureSrc ); 
00059 
00060         if( !capture )
00061         {
00062                 cerr <<"Could not initialize capturing from " << captureSrc << " ...\n";
00063                 return -1;
00064         }
00065 
00066         // Allocate the detector object
00067         planar_object_recognizer detector;
00068 
00069         detector.ransac_dist_threshold = 5;
00070         detector.max_ransac_iterations = 800;
00071         detector.non_linear_refine_threshold = 1.5;
00072 
00073         // Train or load classifier
00074         if(relearn || !detector.build_with_cache(
00075                                 string(modelFile), // mode image file name
00076                                 400,               // maximum number of keypoints on the model
00077                                 32,                // patch size in pixels
00078                                 3,                 // yape radius. Use 3,5 or 7.
00079                                 16,                // number of trees for the classifier. Somewhere between 12-50
00080                                 3                  // number of levels in the gaussian pyramid
00081                                 ))
00082         {
00083                 // interactively acquire a model image
00084                 IplImage *shot = acquire_model(capture);
00085                 cvSaveImage(modelFile, shot);
00086                 detector.build(shot, 400, 32, 3, 16, 3);
00087                 detector.save(string(modelFile)+".classifier");
00088                 cvReleaseImage(&shot);
00089         }
00090 
00091         // A lower threshold will allow detection in harder conditions, but
00092         // might lead to false positives.
00093         detector.match_score_threshold=.03f;
00094 
00095         const char *win = "Bazar";
00096 
00097         IplImage* display=0;
00098         IplImage*gray=0;
00099 
00100         cvNamedWindow(win, 0);
00101 
00102         CamCalibration calib;
00103 
00104         IplImage* frame = cvQueryFrame(capture);
00105         calib.AddCamera(frame->width, frame->height);
00106 
00107         int nbHomography =0;
00108         for(;;)
00109         {
00110                 // acquire image
00111                 frame = cvQueryFrame( capture );
00112                 if( !frame )
00113                         break;
00114 
00115                 // convert it to gray levels, if required
00116                 if (frame->nChannels >1) {
00117                         if( !gray ) 
00118                                 gray = cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(frame), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1 );
00119                         cvCvtColor(frame, gray, CV_RGB2GRAY);
00120                 } else {
00121                         gray = frame;
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 // run the detector
00125                 if (detector.detect(gray)) {
00126                         add_detected_homography(detector, calib);
00127                         nbHomography++;
00128                         cout << nbHomography << " homographies.\n";
00129                         if (nbHomography >=70) {
00130                                 if (calib.Calibrate(
00131                                                         50, // max hom
00132                                                         2,   // random
00133                                                         3,
00134                                                         3,   // padding ratio 1/2
00135                                                         0,
00136                                                         0,
00137                                                         0.0078125,      //alpha
00138                                                         0.9,            //beta
00139                                                         0.001953125,//gamma
00140                                                         12,       // iter
00141                                                         0.05, //eps
00142                                                         3   //postfilter eps
00143                                                    )) {
00144                                         calib.PrintOptimizedResultsToFile1();
00145                                         break;
00146                                 }
00147                         }
00148                 }
00149                 show_result(detector, frame, &display);
00150                 cvShowImage(win, display);
00151                 //cvShowImage(win, frame);
00152 
00153                 if( cvWaitKey(10) >= 0 )
00154                         break;
00155         }
00156 
00157         cvReleaseCapture( &capture );
00158         cvDestroyWindow(win);
00159 
00160         return 0;
00161 }
00162 
00163 void show_result(planar_object_recognizer &detector, IplImage *video, IplImage **dst)
00164 {
00165         if (*dst==0) *dst=cvCloneImage(video);
00166         else cvCopy(video, *dst);
00167 
00168         if (detector.object_is_detected) {
00169                 for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00170 
00171                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00172                         if (match->inlier) {
00173                         cvCircle(*dst,
00174                                 cvPoint((int) (PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, 
00175                                                         int(match->image_point->scale), 0)),
00176                                         (int)(PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, 
00177                                                         int(match->image_point->scale), 0))),
00178                                 3, CV_RGB(0,255,0), -1, 8,0);
00179                         }
00180         }
00181         }
00182 }
00183 
00184 static void putText(IplImage *im, const char *text, CvPoint p, CvFont *f1, CvFont *f2)
00185 {
00186         cvPutText(im,text,p,f2, cvScalarAll(0));
00187         cvPutText(im,text,p,f1, cvScalarAll(255));
00188 }
00189 
00190 IplImage *acquire_model(CvCapture *capture)
00191 {
00192 
00193         const char *win = "Bazar";
00194 
00195         CvFont font, fontbold;
00196 
00197         cvInitFont( &font, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_PLAIN, 1, 1);
00198         cvInitFont( &fontbold, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_PLAIN, 1, 1, 0, 5);
00199 
00200         cvNamedWindow(win, 0);
00201 
00202         bool pause=false;
00203         IplImage *frame;
00204         IplImage *shot=0, *text=0;
00205 
00206         bool accepted =false;
00207         while (!accepted) {
00208 
00209                 if (!pause) {
00210                         frame = cvQueryFrame(capture);
00211                         if (!text) text=cvCloneImage(frame);
00212                         else cvCopy(frame,text);
00213                         putText(text,"Please take a frontal view of a", cvPoint(3,20), &font, &fontbold);
00214                         putText(text,"textured planar surface and press space", cvPoint(3,40), &font, &fontbold);
00215                         cvShowImage(win, text);
00216                 }
00217 
00218                 char k = cvWaitKey(pause ? 0 : 10);
00219                 switch (k) {
00220                         case 'n': pause=false; break;
00221                         case ' ': 
00222                                   pause = !pause; 
00223                                   if (pause) {
00224                                           if (shot) cvCopy(frame,shot);
00225                                           else shot = cvCloneImage(frame);
00226                                           cvCopy(shot,text);
00227                                           putText(text,"Image OK? (y/n)", cvPoint(3,20), &font, &fontbold);
00228                                           cvShowImage(win, text);
00229                                   }
00230                                   break;
00231                         case 'y':
00232                         case '\n': if (pause && shot) accepted=true; break;
00233                         case 'q': exit(0); break;
00234                         case -1: break;
00235                         default: cerr << k << ": what?\n";
00236                 }
00237         }
00238 
00239         cvReleaseImage(&text);
00240         return shot;
00241 }
00242 
00243 bool add_detected_homography(planar_object_recognizer &detector, CamCalibration &calib)
00244 {
00245         static std::vector<CamCalibration::s_struct_points> pts;
00246         pts.clear();
00247 
00248         for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00249                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00250                         if (match->inlier) {
00251                                 pts.push_back(CamCalibration::s_struct_points(
00252                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00253                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00254                                         PyrImage::convCoordf((float)match->object_point->M[0], int(match->object_point->scale), 0),
00255                                         PyrImage::convCoordf((float)match->object_point->M[1], int(match->object_point->scale), 0)));
00256                         }
00257         }
00258 
00259         return calib.AddHomography(0, pts, detector.H);
00260 }
